movie_1.title: The Fun Factory
movie_1.description: Kids take over a school and turn it into the world's first Fun Factory.

movie_2.title: Living Oceans
movie_2.description: The Oceans of the world are the great unknown. In this movie we explore these vast sea worlds, and make unexpected discoveries!

movie_3.title: Space Combat II
movie_3.description: A mission to Mars gets lost, and ends up in an hostile alien world.
